scheme_name: Helios Flexi Cap Fund Direct   Growth
exit_load: Exit Load for units in excess of 10% of the investment,1% will be charged for redemption within 3 months.
description: The Scheme seeks to generate long-term capital appreciation by investing predominantly in equity & equity related instruments across market capitalization.

amc_info.name: Helios Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 502 B, 5th Floor, The Capital, Plot C70,Bandra Kurla Complex,Bandra East, Mumbai 400051

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

fund_manager_details.experience: He has over 32 years of work experience in the areas of investment. He has been a part of Helios Group since its inception in 2005. Prior to joining Helios Group, he has worked in India with various sell side firms in sales for over 14 years.
